boredomPreference.name: set_boredom_preference
boredomPreference.description: Enable or disable random boredom pings from {botName}. When enabled, {botName} will occasionally send friendly messages to active users.

queryKnowledgeBase.name: query_knowledge_base
queryKnowledgeBase.description: Search through accumulated knowledge, memories, and previous conversations to find relevant information.

storeUserOpinion.name: store_user_opinion
storeUserOpinion.description: Store an opinion, preference, or fact about a user for future reference and personalization.

searchWeb.name: search_web
searchWeb.description: Search the web for current information, news, or facts that might be relevant to the conversation.

searchUsers.name: search_users
searchUsers.description: Search for a user by partial name, nickname, or informal reference. Use this to resolve who someone is talking about, get their Discord ID for pings (<@userId>), recall stored opinions, or check their pronouns.
